response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, estimated at $1,000,000. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. This special discount is an opportunity not to be missed, as it allows you to secure this remarkable product at a reduced cost while still capturing its full potential and value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
